meanings.definition: Not causing or likely to cause disagreement or controversy.
meanings.sent1: The decision to order pizza for lunch was an uncontentious choice among the team.
meanings.sent2: The uncontentious nature of the task made it easy for everyone to agree on the next steps.
meanings.sent3: In the uncontentious world of ice cream flavors, vanilla reigns supreme.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as uncontentious as a clear blue sky on a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The uncontentious atmosphere in the meeting room put everyone at ease.

meanings.sent1: The uncontentious document was quickly approved by all parties involved.
meanings.sent2: The uncontentious agreement was signed without any objections.
meanings.sent3: The uncontentious quiz had everyone feeling confident about their answers.
meanings.sent4: His uncontentious victory in the game surprised many spectators.
meanings.sent5: The uncontentious decision to close early was met with relief by the employees.
